{
    "pattern": "SELECT <function_category_parameter> FORMAT <format_parameter>; SELECT <numeric_parameter>; SELECT <numeric_parameter> FORMAT <format_parameter>;",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<function_category_parameter>",
        "<numeric_parameter>",
        "<format_parameter>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "generateUUIDv4(), FORMAT Arrow, FORMAT CSV",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The UUID type generated by generateUUIDv4() is not supported for conversion into Arrow and Parquet data formats, resulting in the UNKNOWN_TYPE exception."
}
